text: Menrva is the Etruscan goddess of war, art, wisdom and health. She was often associated with the Greek goddess Athena.The process, by analogy with interpretatio graeca, was termed interpretatio etrusca by L.B. van der Meer, Interpretatio Etrusca': Greek Myths on Etruscan Mirrors(Amsterdam) 1995. She was the precursor of the Roman Minerva. == References == Category:Etruscan gods and goddesses
title: Menrva
